div.span: Adapted from Inventory of Greek Coin Hoards

div.pre: 240 Euboea, before c. 1940 Burial: c. 170-165 B.C. Contents: 1 AR, 59 AE *Amphipolis: 1 Locri Opuntii: 1 triob. Chalcis: 42 Euboean League: 10 Eretria: 2 Athens: 2 (1*) *Amasia: 1 Clazomenae: 1 Disposition: M. Wallace, Toronto Wallace, NNM 134 (1956), pp. 121-3 * Considered intrusive by Wallace
